Rift Jars: Storing and Handling Rifts
Rift Jars are specialized containers designed to store and manage rifts safely. To handle them effectively, you'll need the Rift Encapsulation Device and Rift Release Device.

How to Encapsulate a Rift:
Placement: Place a Rift Jar slightly below the rift—keep some distance to avoid damage from the rift itself.
Warding Sigil: Place the Rift Warding Seal on top of the jar.
Activation: Use a Mage’s Gauntlet to right-click the device. The rift will be sealed into the jar.
Caution: When the rift disappears, it can cause Warp to nearby entities. Ensure you have a safe escape route and act quickly!
How to Release a Rift:
Placement: Place the jar containing the rift underground at the desired location.
Release Device: Place the Rift Release Device on top of the jar.
Activation: Use a Mage’s Gauntlet to right-click the device. The rift will be released at the location.
Additional Uses for Rift Jars:
As a Trash Bin: Feed unwanted items into the jar's rift using hoppers. It will consume the items.
Warning: Never throw a Rift Jar into another rift or another Rift Jar. Doing so will result in a violent explosion and summon a Primal Spirit—a highly dangerous entity!
Manage rifts wisely to avoid catastrophic outcomes while harnessing their power.
